------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A beautiful property, with a huge balcony overlooking the sea and located in an enviable neighborhood Shonan, Tokyo. But some things are too good to be true. The suicide of the younger sister Mariko, a new resident, is the latest in a string of deaths from the balcony of this apartment. Mariko does not accept the official version of events, and does not believe that all deaths are coincidental. Determined to discover the truth, she will find a history of violence, abuse and despair around the love-hate relationship between mother and daughter, that not even death brought to an end.
